price: ከእነርሱም ውስጥ (ወደፊት) በርሱ የሚያምኑ አልሉ፡፡ ከእነርሱም በእርሱ የማያምኑ አልሉ፡፡ ጌታህም አጥፊዎቹን በጣም ዐዋቂ ነው፡፡
arabic: وَمِنۡهُم مَّن يُؤۡمِنُ بِهِۦ وَمِنۡهُم مَّن لَّا يُؤۡمِنُ بِهِۦۚ وَرَبُّكَ أَعۡلَمُ بِٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamin'hum man yu'minu bihi wamin'hum man lā yu'minu bihi warabbuka aʿlamu bil-muf'sidīna
